DOC.brief_summary: This research study involve implement evaluate physical training program specifically design reduce risk ligamentous knee injury female soccer player incorporate proven neuromuscular proprioceptive training concept concise , on-field warm-up activity . All 283 Division I NCAA woman ’ soccer team ask participate research study . Those agreed randomize control ( usual training program ) intervention ( alternative warm-up program ) . Both group team provide investigator participation knee injury information 15 week 2002 fall soccer season . Requested information include would readily available certify athletic trainer ( ATC ) normal course duty . The knee injury rate among intervention team athlete compare control team athlete determine program effectiveness . Data collection complete report submit shortly publication .
DOC.brief_title: RCT PEP Program Reduce ACL Injuries Female Collegiate Soccer Players

Both group team provide investigator participation knee injury information 15 week 2002 fall soccer season . Requested information include would readily available certify athletic trainer ( ATC ) normal course duty . The knee injury rate among intervention team athlete compare control team athlete determine program effectiveness . Data collection complete report submit shortly publication .
